name: Naughty Granny
description:
Description

Strategic game created in 48h on Slavic Game Jam 2015

How to Play?

  1. Use your mouse to rotate elements which are surrounded by a blue circle
  2. Power of barrels can be set with the indicators below them
  3. You can move flowers by dragging them around
  4. Use the red button to swap between Edit and Play Mode

Tip: Do not give up we promise that all 4 levels can be finished :D
